channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title:
中国制造客机在新加坡航展上寻找买家。
中国政府希望通过 C919 飞机挑战顶级飞机制造商空中客车公司和波音公司长达数十年的主导地位，同时减少对外国技术的依赖。
item.description:
Made-in-China airliner seeks buyers at Singapore Airshow.

With its C919 aircraft, Beijing wants to challenge the decades-long dominance of top plane-makers Airbus and Boeing while reducing its reliance on foreign technology

u.afp.com/5Nnp

item.title: 视频： 世界顶级旅游景点之一的巴黎埃菲尔铁塔因员工罢工而关闭。工会称，此次罢工是为了抗议纪念碑的财务管理方式，罢工可能会延长。
item.description: VIDEO: The Eiffel Tower in Paris, one of the world's top tourist attractions, is closed after staff went on strike. The strike, which was called to protest over the way the monument is managed financially, could be extended, unions say

item.title:
以色列抗议者阻挡前往加沙的援助车队。
就在饱受战争蹂躏的加沙地带面临饥荒威胁的时候，以色列抗议者却一再聚集起来，阻止急需的援助物资进入巴勒斯坦领土。
item.description:
Israeli protesters block aid convoys bound for Gaza.

Even as the threat of famine stalks the war-ravaged Gaza Strip, Israeli protesters have gathered repeatedly to stop desperately needed aid from getting into the Palestinian territory

u.afp.com/5NnU

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗孀指责弗拉基米尔-普京总统杀害了她的丈夫，并发誓要在他上周死于俄罗斯北极监狱后继续他毕生的事业。
item.description:
Alexei Navalny's widow has accused President Vladimir Putin of killing her husband and vowed to continue his life's work following his death last week in a Russian Arctic prison

u.afp.com/5Nsr

item.title:
R to @AFP：#最新消息：澳大利亚周二概述了一项长达十年的计划，即在亚太军备竞赛加速的情况下，将其战舰舰队增加一倍，并将国防开支再增加 70 亿美元。
根据该计划，澳大利亚海军的主要水面作战舰艇将从目前的 11 艘增加到 26 艘。
"国防部长理查德-马尔斯（Richard Marles）说："这将是自第二次世界大战结束以来我们拥有的最大舰队。
item.description:
#UPDATE Australia on Tuesday outlined a decade-long plan to double its fleet of warships and boost defence spending by an additional US$7 billion, in the face of a quickening Asia-Pacific arms race.

Under the plan, Australia will get a navy of 26 major surface combatant ships, up from 11 today.

"It is the largest fleet that we will have since the end of the Second World War," says Defence Minister Richard Marles

item.title:
R to @AFP：#最新消息：中国央行周二下调了用于抵押贷款定价的关键基准贷款利率，因为中国政府正寻求提振疲软的经济增长，并对抗其他主要经济体的加息。
中国人民银行宣布，五年期贷款最优惠利率（LPR）从4.2降至3.95。作为企业贷款基准的一年期贷款优惠利率保持在 3.45% 不变。
item.description:
#UPDATE China's central bank on Tuesday cut a key benchmark lending rate used to price mortgages, as Beijing seeks to boost flagging growth and counter rate hikes in other major economies.

The five-year loan prime rate (LPR) was lowered from 4.2 to 3.95, the People's Bank of China announced. The one-year LPR, which serves as a benchmark for corporate loans, remained unchanged at 3.45%

item.title: #中国央行下调基准贷款利率提振经济
item.description: #BREAKING China central bank cuts benchmark lending rate to boost economy

item.title: R to @AFP：以色列军方公布了新的图片，并表达了对一位母亲和她的两个儿子的担忧，其中包括一名婴儿，他是在加沙被巴勒斯坦武装分子扣押的年龄最小的人质。
item.description: Israel's military published new images and voiced concern about a mother and her two boys -- including a baby who is the youngest hostage held by Palestinian militants in Gaza. u.afp.com/5NeQ

item.title: 美国职业棒球大联盟华盛顿国民队（Washington Nationals）的主要所有者马克-勒纳（Mark Lerner）表示，在近两年的时间里，该队一直没有达成交易，因此不再出售。
item.description:
Major League Baseball's Washington Nationals are no longer for sale after nearly two years available without a deal, principal owner Mark Lerner said.

u.afp.com/5Ne7

item.title: #澳大利亚公布耗资 70 亿美元的海军改造计划
item.description: #BREAKING Australia unveils US$7 billion plan to overhaul navy

item.title: 厄瓜多尔总统发誓不向乌克兰运送苏联时期的武器，这引发了厄瓜多尔与莫斯科在香蕉和鲜花出口问题上的争执。
item.description:
Ecuador said it will refrain from sending Soviet-era weapons to Ukraine after the president's vow to do so sparked a spat with Moscow over banana and flower exports.

u.afp.com/5Nec

item.title: 当局称，在特立尼达和多巴哥附近一艘神秘驳船倾覆并泄漏石油的地点附近，一个装有一公斤（2.2 磅）以上可卡因的塑料袋被冲上了海滩。
item.description:
A plastic bag containing more than a kilogram (2.2 pounds) of cocaine has washed up on a beach near the spot where a mysterious barge capsized and spilled oil off Trinidad and Tobago, authorities said.
u.afp.com/5Nek

item.title: R to @AFP：#UPDATE 数十名俄罗斯人在警察的严密监视下，在莫斯科的一座纪念碑前献花悼念阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼，尽管在这位反对派偶像宣布死讯后的几天里，有数百人被捕。
item.description:
#UPDATE Dozens of Russians, closely watched by police, left flower tributes at a Moscow monument to honour the memory of Alexei Navalny despite hundreds of arrests in the days since the opposition icon's death was announced.

u.afp.com/5Nst

item.title: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelensky）说，他的部队在广阔的前线部分地区正面临复杂的战斗，西方军事援助的延迟对他的军队造成了影响。
item.description:
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said his troops were facing complicated fighting along sections of the sprawling front line, with delays in Western military aid impacting his army.
u.afp.com/5NeA

item.title: R to @AFP：#UPDATES 水晶宫周一任命前法兰克福主帅奥利弗-格拉斯纳（Oliver Glasner）为新任主帅，此前他们确认罗伊-霍奇森（Roy Hodgson）将因球队在英超联赛中的糟糕战绩而下课。#AFPSports
item.description:
#UPDATES Crystal Palace named former Eintracht Frankfurt boss Oliver Glasner as their new manager on Monday after confirming Roy Hodgson was stepping down following a terrible run of results for the struggling Premier League club. #AFPSports
u.afp.com/5NsK

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息 陷入困境的那不勒斯解雇了沃尔特-马扎里，并引进了斯洛伐克教练弗朗切斯科-卡尔佐纳。#AFPSports

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息：欧盟外交政策负责人何塞普-博雷利（Josep Borrell）表示，除匈牙利外，所有欧盟国家都加入了呼吁 "立即暂停加沙战争的人道主义行动 "的行列。
item.description:
#UPDATE All EU countries except Hungary joined a call for an "immediate humanitarian pause" in the Gaza war, foreign policy chief Josep Borrell said.
u.afp.com/5New

item.title: 欧盟于周一正式启动了一项海军任务，以保护红海航运免受也门胡蒂叛军的袭击，因为该组织的袭击迫使一艘船的船员弃船，并损坏了另一艘船。
item.description:
The EU formally launched a naval mission on Monday to protect Red Sea shipping from Yemen's Huthi rebels as attacks by the group forced the crew of one vessel to abandon ship and damaged another.

u.afp.com/5NeT

item.title: R to @AFP：以色列警告说，除非哈马斯释放所有人质，否则它将在穆斯林斋月期间继续发动进攻，包括在最南部的拉法地区。
item.description:
Deadly fighting raged on in Gaza as Israel warned that unless Hamas frees all hostages it will push on with its offensive during the Muslim holy month of Ramadan, including in the far-southern Rafah area.
u.afp.com/5Neg

item.title:
2015 年，哈维-埃尔南德斯在捧起辉煌的三冠王奖杯后离开了巴塞罗那，但他作为教练第二次胜利告别的希望已经破灭。
#AFPSports
item.description:
Xavi Hernandez left Barcelona in 2015 after lifting a glorious treble, but his hopes of a second triumphant farewell as coach have been whittled away.
u.afp.com/5NsD
#AFPSports

item.title: 九个世纪以来，印度人一直在巴巴-哈吉-罗兹比（Baba Haji Rozbih）的森林圣地祈祷。巴巴-哈吉-罗兹比（Baba Haji Rozbih）是一位受人尊敬的苏菲派圣人，他的墓地是首都德里最古老的伊斯兰遗址之一。
item.description:
For nine centuries, Indians prayed at the forest shrine of Baba Haji Rozbih, a revered Sufi saint whose grave is one of the capital Delhi's oldest Islamic sites.
u.afp.com/5NsL

item.title: 乌克兰东部城镇阿夫迪耶夫卡落入莫斯科军队之手，俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼死亡，美国对基辅的军事援助正在减少。
item.description:
The eastern Ukrainian town of Avdiivka has fallen to Moscow's troops, Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny is dead and US military aid to Kyiv is waning.

u.afp.com/5Nsu

item.title: #也门胡塞武装称两艘美国军舰在亚丁湾遭到袭击
item.description: #BREAKING Yemen Huthis say two American ships targeted in Gulf of Aden

item.title: 联合国秘书长安东尼奥-古特雷斯（Antonio Guterres）说，阿富汗当局拒绝了多哈会谈的邀请，驻阿富汗的国际特使们希望塔利班能参加他们今后的会议。
item.description:
UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said international envoys to Afghanistan hope for Taliban participation at their future meetings after the authorities snubbed an invitation to talks in Doha.

u.afp.com/5NsQ

item.title: R to @AFP：#唐纳德-特朗普在一份声明中结束了对阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼逝世的长时间沉默，声明避免了对克里姆林宫的批评，而是将这位俄罗斯反对派领导人的突然去世描绘成美国崩溃的标志。
item.description:
#UPDATE Donald Trump ended his lengthy silence on the death of Alexei Navalny, in a statement that avoided criticism of the Kremlin and instead portrayed the Russian opposition leader's sudden passing as a sign of a collapsing United States.
u.afp.com/5NsY

item.title: 每隔两个月，米开朗基罗 1504 年完成的杰作就会在其位于佛罗伦萨阿卡德米亚美术馆的家中接受一次仔细的清洗，这幅杰作已经在这里驻留了 150 多年。
item.description:
Every two months, Michelangelo's masterpiece completed in 1504 undergoes a careful cleaning at its home in Florence's Accademia Gallery, where it has resided for over 150 years.

u.afp.com/5Ns5

item.title: R to @AFP：#BREAKING Oliver Glasner named as new Crystal Palace manager: club #AFPSports
